mythology.title: Hindu Mythology
mythology.description:
Explore the vast cosmos of Hindu mythology, from the Trimurti (Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva) to the countless
                devas and devis. Journey through the cycles of creation and destruction, the paths to moksha (liberation),
                and the sacred wisdom of the Vedas, Upanishads, and Bhagavad Gita.

deities.name: Hanuman
deities.title: Hindu - Hanuman
deities.description: The Monkey God, Supreme Devotee, Divine Servant
domains: Bajrangbali (One with Limbs Strong as Vajra/Thunderbolt)
symbols: Rama's image on his chest (eternal devotion)
epithets: Bajrangbali (One with Limbs Strong as Vajra/Thunderbolt)

relationships.mother: anjana - an apsara who was cursed to be born as a vanara

deities.name: Kali
deities.title: Hindu - Kali
deities.description: Goddess of Time, Destruction, and Liberation
domains: Chamunda (Destroyer of Chanda and Munda demons)
symbols: Cremation grounds (she dwells where death is present)
epithets: Chamunda (Destroyer of Chanda and Munda demons)

deities.name: Lakshmi
deities.title: Hindu - Lakshmi
deities.description: Goddess of Prosperity, Fortune, and Beauty
symbols: White elephants (two elephants often flank her
bathing her in water - Gajalakshmi form)
Owl (in some traditions - representing wealth coming in darkness)

relationships.father: bhrigu (in some traditions) or born directly from the cosmic ocean
